positive.review: Among Us meets survival horror. Nothing like freezing to death while arguing over who’s secretly eating everyone.
rest in peace my beloved.
Very sad to see this gone... especially when i pay for a game. Huge L to the publisher. Had a lot of good times with randoms in this game, wish all of you the best. Godspeed

I have a lot of great memories from this game that I will cherish forever. I met people in France, Russia, Australia, Argentina, and elsewhere. I played for over 300 hours.

It was a good game, but certain decisions along the way severely limited its potential. Probably the worst decision of all was the developers insisting on hosting the servers themselves and spending exorbitant amounts of money on inefficient moderators who were overwhelmed by the volume of trolls and cheaters. 

Despite their moderation efforts, the trolls and cheaters kept showing up and ruining the game for other players. You could buy a copy of the game in the world's second most populous country for around $10 so many of the trolls and cheaters who were banned would buy a new copy with a new account and go right back to cheating and murdering their teammates.  

The negative reviews piled up. People stopped buying the game because it had bad reviews. The devs gave up on making new content only one year after release, and moved on to other projects. No new money was coming in, but money was going out on server hosting and moderation. And then the devs pulled the plug, just two years after release. 

Overall I cherish the game for what it was and what it gave me, but it leaves a bittersweet taste because I think it failed to live up to its potential and shouldn't have ended the way it did.
Among Us meets survival horror. Nothing like freezing to death while arguing over who’s secretly eating everyone.
BRING BACK THIS GAME PLSSS

negative.review: worst servers possible

It's a great game but you will not find a server or match that is not in China. If you have friends to play with, amazing game, if you are willing to sit there and cycle over and over again until you find the one friendly Chinese group? Sure, go for it.
players will kill you for specking English and eat you
worst servers possible
